posts.post_content:
Hi Folks, I have not done much posting but am an active card collector.  I have been concentrating on PSA graded 1934/36 Diamond Stars and some other sets.  I am just now starting to again purchase PSA graded T206s (in PSA 2 to 4).  I am starting to focus on a subset, that being Portraits.  In fact, there is a category of T206 Portraits on the PSA Set Registry that will be participating in.

Anyway, I just wanted to say hi.  I will be spending more time on this forum, listening to other participant's expertise, and looking for opportunities to add to my collection.
Welcome. Tread lightly, T206's can be quite addicting. :) Good luck on your future hunting.

[quote name="DeanH3" post=1739836]Welcome. Tread lightly, T206's can be quite addicting. :) Good luck on your future hunting.[/QUOTE]

Truer words have never been written :)

Welcome! I pursue portraits, too--they are literally a joy! Best of luck in your collecting adventures!
